original: shr'i sa ha dza sa bar sva tishtha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i sa ha dza sa bar sva tishtha nam n'a ma /

original: dpal lhan gci skyes pa bde ba'i mchog bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal lhan gci skyes pa bde ba'i mchog bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Self-Consecration of Glorious Sahaja Śrī Heruka

original: he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: kye ho sgrub pa'i snying po bde chen rang gi sems //
analyzed: kye ho sgrub pa'i snying po bde chen rang gi sems //
translated: Oh! The essence of practice, one's own mind of great bliss,

original: 'khrul ba'i dbang gis rkyen dang bcas gyur kyang //
analyzed: 'khrul ba'i dbang gis rkyen dang bcas gyur kyang //
translated: Though under the power of delusion, accompanied by conditions,

original: rgya mtshe'i chu ni dang sa ma'i rang bzhin yin //
analyzed: rgya mtshe'i chu ni dang sa ma'i rang bzhin yin //
translated: The water of the ocean is by nature pure.

original: rnyog ma'i rang bzhin glo bur rkyen las byung //
analyzed: rnyog ma'i rang bzhin glo bur rkyen las byung //
translated: The nature of turbidity arises from temporary conditions.

original: ma bcos rang sar bzhag na rgyal ba'i thugs //
analyzed: ma bcos rang sar bzhag na rgyal ba'i thugs //
translated: If left uncontrived in its own place, it is the mind of the Victorious Ones.

original: 'di na bla ma'i dus thabs bsten las byung ba ste //
analyzed: 'di na bla ma'i dus thabs bsten las byung ba ste //
translated: Here, it arises from relying on the guru's timely methods.

original: thabs kyi rgyal po bya ba thams cad gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: thabs kyi rgyal po bya ba thams cad gtang bar bya'o //
translated: The king of methods is to abandon all activities.

original: zhes ri khrod pa chen pos gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes ri khrod pa chen pos gsungs so //
translated: Thus it was taught by the Great Hermit.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag rdzogs so//
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag rdzogs so//
translated: The esoteric instruction of Mahāmudrā is complete.
